officeHours: Monday - Friday, 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM, and by appointment
description:
Our team at Puff & Cockerill, L.L.C., has served New Jersey families and businesses in Pitman for four generations. We put our clients first in all our cases and offer honest advice that protects your best interest. Whenever possible, our law firm helps our clients seek peaceful resolutions, but years of experience also taught us when to take a more aggressive stance.

Practice Areas We Handle

Our large team of experienced professionals allows us to represent clients across a wide legal spectrum. Our law firm primarily handles civil cases in the following areas:

  • Estate law: Whether you need assistance with estate planning and asset protection or you are wrapping up the affairs of a deceased loved one, we can help.
  • Family law: Families turn to us for assistance with adoption, divorce, child custody and other family matters that may call for legal advice and representation.
  • Real estate law: We represent clients in real estate issues related to land zoning, leases, landlord-tenant disputes and other real estate issues.
  • Other services: Our additional legal services include personal injury, wrongful death, business law, litigation, workers' compensation and appeals.

Why Clients Love Puff & Cockerill, L.L.C.

Clients can rely on our law firm for all their civil litigation needs. They have come to trust our experience, our professionalism and the longevity of our practice.
